CustomField.description: This is the parent of this record. If this record is a Subcategory, the Parent must be a Category. If this record is a Category, the Parent must be a Pillar.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the parent of this record. If this record is a Subcategory, the Parent must be a Category. If this record is a Category, the Parent must be a Pillar.
CustomField.label: Parent
